name: Vengeance - That's the spirit!
description:
A short top-down magic caster where you are a ghost that needs to possess armor pieces in order to achieve your goal.

WASD - Move

Space bar - Dash (only when you have the boots)

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Click - Cast (only when you have the scepter)

Art kit by: https://kenney.nl/assets

Game created for the Miz Jam 1 -  Game Jam.

Follow me on Twitter: @proto_fun
